title: Wild Cherry Lane off Sea Shell Lane was partially cleared a couple years ago to allow access to a new home.  A neighborhood petetition was signed to stop further clearing of land for full extension of Wild Cherry Lane.  Where would the petetion be filed if on record and how can I get a copy?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. The county planning and zoning office might be the best place to start: http://www.nhcgov.com/planningandinspections/Pages/Home.aspx
